In ND, where our summers are only three months long, we especially cherish our access to lakes and rivers. Great to discuss my bipartisan LAKES Act to improve [[user]]-managed outdoor recreation facilities with [[user]]! [[url]]

Sat down with [[user]]’s Ron Ness and the US Oil and Gas Association this morning to discuss permitting reform legislation. We talked about how [[user]]'s RESTART Act is the best foot forward in the battle to get critical energy and infrastructure projects approved. [[url]]

Jeffery Baran’s voting record and public comments on environmental justice signal his goals for the Commission could impede the advancement of our nation’s nuclear energy capabilities. I questioned [[user]] nominee Baran at an [[user]] hearing this morning ? ? [[url]]

Good morning, During the last two weeks, I voted against the $1.7 trillion omnibus spending bill, penned an op-ed in the Wall Street Journal on the European Union's carbon border adjustment mechanism agreement, and celebrated the passage of the National Defense Authorization Act and Water Resources Development Act . I also joined Newsmax to discuss the outcome of the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States review of the Fufeng Group's purchase of farmland near Grand Forks Air Force Base.

Thanks to members of [[user]] for stopping by to discuss the important role the title industry plays in North Dakota, as well as my SECURE Notarization Act which would allow for a safe and convenient remote online notarization process. [[url]]
